name: Grimlands - a post-apocalyptic RPG/Shooter MMO (Canceled)
blurb: Grimlands: the innovative mix of Shooter and MMORPG with an open, post-apocalyptic world, incredible crafting & free skill development.

rewards.reward: No Reward

BACKER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Receive emails and newsletters with access to exclusive information about development progress and feature designs.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also be named in a special thanks section of the game\u2019s credits.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Additionally you will have access to the exclusive Kickstarter Subscription Server as long as you have a Premium Account.
PLAYER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Premium account for 1 month  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards.

STARTER PACK ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ To make your start in Grimlands easier you will receive a starter pack containing assorted healing items, consumables and a unique, cool looking bandana.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also gain early access to closed betas (next closed beta is expected in June 2013)  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards.

EARLY FOUNDER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ All your characters on your account will receive the Founder title that is only available via Kickstarter to identify yourself as a key supporter of the game.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive a Founder Pack containing two unique gear items (face mask and shirt) only available here  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This pledge is the same as FOUNDER, just at a lower price.

FOUNDER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ All your characters on your account will receive the Founder title that is only available via Kickstarter to identify yourself as a key supporter of the game.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive a Founder Pack containing two unique gear items (face mask and shirt) only available here  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards.

HARDCORE PLAYER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Gain early access to the game giving you a head start of 7 days before the commercial launch of the game.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You also receive a premium account for 3 months. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nYou also receive the Hardcore Pack containing a unique, large bag with 32 slots for all your storage space needs.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards!

DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will receive the unique, custom and highly modified automatic assault sniper rifle that is only available via Kickstarter. This incredible weapon can be used starting as a fresh character up to the end-game as in Grimlands the ammunition does the damage, not the firearm.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive two unique in-game gear items (long coat and trousers).  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive the digital downloadable Grimlands soundtrack  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards!
BOXED EDITION ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will receive a boxed copy of the game.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards.

BLACK HUMVEE ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Receive the custom made, unique looking Black Humvee. This extraordinary vehicle in Grimlands is great for off-road travel and combat allowing you to mount up to two guns and allowing travelling with up to 4 players. This vehicle is already fully customized, modded and offers a unique look not achievable by other means. \r\n ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Additionally you receive another unique in-game gear reward.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You also receive a premium account for 6 months.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And all previous rewards except boxed copy.

THE ONE ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your character name will be reserved for you on all servers, even the future ones.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive a premium account for 12 months  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~And all previous rewards except boxed copy.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Receive a special collector\u2019s edition boxed copy including the world map, soundtrack on CD, T-Shirt and the novel with the Grimlands backstory. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Additionally this reward also includes all previous rewards making this the ultimate physical bundle.
PARTNER PACKAGE ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Receive THE ONE twice, for you and a friend.

VIP ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Get a personal 60min introduction to Grimlands by a member of the game design team. Using Skype we will show you the ropes and answer your questions and share a secret or two to give you the best start in the game possible upon its launch. You will need Skype and the only languages possible are either English, Polish or German.\r\n ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive THE ONE reward and 36 months of Premium Account, renewable for 1USD per year (normal price: 9,99USD/month)

CLAN PACK ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your clan name will be reserved for you on all servers, even the future ones.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive THE ONE reward for yourself.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Additionally you will receive 25 Closed Beta invitations to give to your clan mates. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive.

CRAFTER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ A weapon or armor mod will be named after your character with a cool item description to boot. Mods are core element of crafting and itemization in Grimands meaning that this is quite a big deal.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive THE ONE reward and a 36 month Premium Account, renewable for 1USD per year (normal price: 9,99USD/month).  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right to hold the copyright to the item based on your character name by DRAGO.

NAME GIVER  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  You will have the opportunity to name one NPC in the game. We will let you decide on a first-come, first-serve basis if it will be a quest giver, a vendor or even an enemy!  
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
You will also receive THE ONE reward.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
We reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.

DUNGEON MASTER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Name one of the dungeons in the game and its boss. Just think about how often players venture in dungeons and fight against bosses \u2013 they will not forget your fearful name\u2026 or that of your mother in law.   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n You will also receive THE ONE reward. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.

STORY TELLER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ A location or point of interest will be named after your character with some background lore giving other players more information about your character. You provide us with a short background to your character and we will incorporate it into the location\u2019s lore. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou will also receive THE ONE reward. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.

ULTIMATE VIP ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This package bundles former Rewards VIP, Story Teller, Dungeon Master, Name Giver and Crafter which means you can name a Dungeon, a NPC, a MOD and a location or point of interest.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ We will aslo give you a personal tour through the game.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ And we'll send you the COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION reward, too. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.

DESIGN CONSULTANT ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will have the opportunity to take part in weekly conference calls with the design team and the lead game designer to brainstorm features and balancing. We can\u2019t guarantee we will take all your ideas and input into the game, but we evaluate them during these sessions.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your name will be mentioned as \u2018Design Consultant\u2019 in the game\u2019s credits. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou will also receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward.

LEGEND ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ When you provide us with your character name and its background we will make both part of a cool quest.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also be invited to the launch party to be held in Krakow, Poland, the hometown of the developer and one of the most beautiful cities in Europe (airfare and hotel not included).  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Additionally, you will receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nWe reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.

ADVERTISER: You have a Company and want to reach the Grimlands audience with your message? You are the top-clan and are looking for members? Or do you just want to have a huge picture of your character to seen by everyone? We sell you the right to advertise on one of the game's huge billboards as long as the game is online.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Images can be changed once a year.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou will also be invited to the launch party to be held in Krakow, Poland, the hometown of the developer and one of the most beautiful cities in Europe (airfare and hotel not included). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Of course you will also receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward.   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for approval of the content.

PRODUCER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Invitation to stay with the development team for up to one month in the final stage of development. Learn every detail of how the game is made, watch over the shoulders of the team and discuss design choices (airfare and hotel stay not included).  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will be mentioned as \u2018Assistant Producer\u2019 in the game\u2019s credits.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou will also be invited to the launch party to be held in Krakow, Poland, the hometown of the developer and one of the most beautiful cities in Europe (airfare and hotel not included).

BIRTHDAY PARTY ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Your birthday (or another date of your choice) will be declared a national holiday in Grimlands with in-game events organized in your name!  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou will also be invited to the launch party to be held in Krakow, Poland, the hometown of the developer and one of the most beautiful cities in Europe (airfare and hotel not included). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe reserve the right for date/name approval and to reject dates/names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the date to be held by DRAGO.

CITY FOUNDER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ A city named after your character. That\u2019s right, if you support Grimlands with that kind of money we will name one of the five major cities after your character for all eternity! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will also receive the ULTIMATE VIP reward.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nAnd you will be invited to the launch party to be held in Krakow, Poland, the hometown of the developer and one of the most beautiful cities in Europe (airfare and hotel not included).  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ We reserve the right for name approval and to reject names we deem inappropriate or offensive. We also reserve the right for the copyright to the character name to be held by DRAGO.
